title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - s/n Carrer de l'Urgell
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - s/n Carrer de l'Urgell
description: It is the car park of the Olesa de Montserrat sports center. There is always room. From here there are routes for walking and walking with the dog. Very quiet area at night. A little further up the path there is a fountain where you can drink or fill 1.5l bottles of water. Due to the type of trickle source, I don't think they can fill bottles. If you feel like it, you can pay to enter the indoor pool or the summer pool.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 66 Carrer de Lluís Puigjaner
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 66 Carrer de Lluís Puigjaner
description: Drinking water fountain with good jet

title: (08640) Barcelona - 11 Carrer del Vapor Cremat
description: Gas station with free water service.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 51 Carrer Cebriá de Montserrat
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 51 Carrer Cebriá de Montserrat
description: It is a large dirt car park where you can park quietly, walk around the town and spend the night. It is very popular with all the residents of the area. There is a pipican nearby and walking routes. The supermarket is a few minutes walk away.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Junto al rio Llobregat
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Junto al rio Llobregat
description: 12 covered barbecues and water, parking for several caravans, DO NOT PASS THE NIGHT it's floodplain by the river llobregat. It is better to go on weekdays, the weekends are very busy. Beside this place, they are preparing an area to keep the huge motorhomes about 200.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description: Land area near the river, very quiet.

title: (08292) Esparreguera - 13 Carrer de Sant Joan
description: Self-service laundry. You have a blue zone right in front of you. The first 30 minutes of the blue zone are free by entering the license plate in the machine. And there is also a loading and unloading area right in front of the laundry room. It goes either with cash or with the laundry recharge card. At the moment there is no option to pay by card.

title: (08292) Esparreguera - 121 Avinguda Francesc Marimon
description: Wide area to park. We have spent the night. Noise from the highway right next door. Supermarkets and gas station attached. We have not seen prohibition signs.

title: (08292) Esparreguera - Carrer del Tallaferro
description: Quiet place to spend the night, close to the motorway exit, but you don't hear it. It is located between a forest and an industrial area. Our night from Saturday to Sunday was very quiet with no noise, but during the week I don't know if there is noise at night. Ideal place to make a stopover if you want to continue the next day.

title: (08630) Abrera - 3 Carrer Joan Miró
description: Free public parking day and night belongs to the Catalan railways for its customers, but the use is free for anyone, it has no barriers. A good decision if you intend to visit the mythical mountain of Montserrat and its surroundings, since the parking in Montserrat is quite expensive.

title: (08630) Abrera - 5 Avinguda Circumval·lacio
description: Very quiet parking for about 20 cars next to the farmhouse restaurant and children's play area, there is a toilet in the farmhouse, drinking fountain and soccer field

title: (08630) Abrera - 1 Carrer del Treball
description: A place where you can find a water fountain next to the playground spaces for this parked next door.

title: (08630) Abrera - 4 Carrer Hostal del Pi
description: Large parking lot next to a shopping center with supermarket, bakeries / cafes, toilets ... there is also a gas station and a mechanical workshop.

title: (08635) Ca n'Amat - 8 Avinguda Ca n'Amat
description: Parking area day and night, illuminated, quiet, with bakery cafeteria at 25m there are no water, electricity or emptying services, it is 20km from Montserrat and 25km from Barcelona

title: (08293) Collbató - Autovia del Nord-Est
description: It's a hidden place in between olive trees. No water or toilets. Nice view, but close to the highway.

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 10 Carrer de les Margarides
description: Parking in front of the Instituto de Vacarisses. It has quite large battery parking lots where a normal motorhome can fit without having to park badly. To spend the night on holidays or school vacations it is perfect, quiet and safe. You can hear the passing of cars on the national road, but it is a good solution to spend the night.

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 54 Carrer Josep Carner
description: Quiet place, outside Barcelona, it is not beautiful but it is convenient for those who arrive late in the evening and want to stay out of the chaos of the city without traveling too many kilometers. There is a grove alongside and a water fountain

title: (08293) Collbató - 52 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
description: Parking lot between the library and the entrance to the castle. sloping at the front, a bit straight at the top of the boules pitch. Water at the entrance to the library. quiet at night.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 15 C-55
description: Ground parking located right next to the cable car to go up to Montserrat. Not ideal for sleeping because there is the road right next

title: (08293) Collbató - 14 Passeig la Fumada
description: Site are services very close to the town. Ideal to spend a quiet night close to everything away from everything at the same time.

title: (08293) Monistrol de Montserrat - B-112
description: Shaded car park with a few flat spaces, above the Tourist Office on the Coves road. Large picnic area with toilets and barbecue areas. Start of hikes and access to climbing areas. Very calm. Path closed at night.

title: (08293) Collbató - 1 Passeig Ronda
description: Public parking in the village. Very wide and without slopes. Quiet night. Without shadow. Without services. Close to supermarket and shops. Sunday weekly market.

title: (08293) Collbató - 8 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: 41.567405,1.823625 Great place to spend the night, very quiet. A 5-minute walk from town, with a bakery, pharmacy, hiking or cycling trails, supermarkets, Sunday market, sports center and monuments all nearby. A little further down, between the playground and the skate park, there is also a drinking water point. We spent the night very quietly, with no height restrictions, no shade or servants but with the peace of sleeping at the foot of Montserrat mountain. A pleasure that we will definitely repeat. My AC of 7.40 meters and 3.20 meters high. GREAT.

title: (08231) Ullastrell - 9 Carrer de la Peça
description: P6 La Peça. Ample parking for vans / AC capacity for 25 vehicles. 5 minutes from the center of Ullastrell on foot, where you can find small supermarkets, pharmacy and bars. In the parking lot there is a park with a zip line for children, a drinking water fountain and rubbish bins. unbeatable views of Montserrat. paved and flat place. Area with video surveillance. recommended.

title: (08635) Sant Esteve Sesrovires - 39 Avinguda Moixeró
description:
Small free parking next to a playground.
A 5 minute walk access to the green route with many possibilities of paths on foot or by mountain bike. Routes possible to Montserrat

title: (08231) Ullastrell - 8 BV-1202
description: Parking without services

title: (08293) Collbató -
description: We stopped here one night in the middle of the cypresses. view towards Montserrat, drinking water fountain opposite the church a few minutes walk. from here you can leave for various paths and caves, watch out for mosquitoes in the evening.

title: (08231) Ullastrell -
description: Next to the cemetery, to the town. Quiet

title: (08760) Martorell - 30 Carrer Elías
description: Small plain next to can Bros where you can see a semi abandoned town of the old industrial belt of bcn

title: (08199) Monestir de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description:
Montserrat is interesting in two points of view, it is a sumptuous monastery located in a natural park composed of quite spectacular mountains.
Vast parking with beautiful views. The guards propose to approach their building at the end of the day in the parking lot (very flat) once they have left, in order to provide us with better protection. ("In case of problem, you honk and intervene ...").

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 36 E-9
description:
Area of Montserrat
We have stopped to eat in the car. The restaurant is temporarily closed.
Area of trucks and others next to gas station.
I do not know if you can stay overnight.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 8 Carrer Travessera del Pi
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 8 Carrer Travessera del Pi
description: Quiet place to sleep near a house in the urbanization

title: (08760) Martorell - Plaça 19
description: Picnic area with barbecues (closed in summer) with tables, with playgrounds, soccer and basketball courts, you can walk and cycle routes, fountain next to the barbecues to get water. Closed at night. You cannot spend the night in the parking lot.

title: (08232) Viladecavalls - 52 Camí de la Plana
description: Good place to spend the night as it is a very quiet and safe urbanization. Parking next to the park.

title: (08760) Martorell - 0 Carrer Francesc Carmona
description: Parking for rest on the road, located in the city and places for AC. It is a residential area and very close to Carrefour and Mercadona supermarkets. Ability to stay overnight without indicating otherwise. Very calm. There are no services.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 11 BP-1121
description: Parking for visiting the Monastery of Montseratte.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - BP-1103
description: Quiet place to spend the day and make routes through the area, 1 km walk along the road to the Montserrat Monastery (20 eur is worth parking inside). There are tables and benches to eat.

title: (08294) El Bruc Residencial - A-2
description: Via de servei aprop de montserrat amb dutxes, sink, electricity and quiet. It is next to the highway but as a last resort it could be useful for sleeping

title: (08294) El Bruc -
description: Quiet place, next to the restaurant. Hiking and climbing area.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 11 BP-1121
description: Parking is complicated, the lot is a bit uneven, but the view is nice. Very near street. Except for a few cars at night, relatively quiet. Free and not far from the monastery. There is space for 3-4 campers.

title: (08760) Martorell - 2 Passatge Can Serra
description: Great parking area for rest and overnight. Next to Carrefour shopping center, (it's not the shopping center's parking lot). With wooded area and very well connected. It does not have services. It is illuminated at night. Next to the red cross and municipal sports center.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 112 Carrer de la Trinitat
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 112 Carrer de la Trinitat
description: Perfect spot to start hikes to the monastery. Quite during the night!

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Avinguda de l'Abat Escarré
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Avinguda de l'Abat Escarré
description: Parking near the sports field. We spent the night from Saturday to Sunday quite quiet. There are no services. To park and go to the assault of the path leading to the Monastery of Montserrat. Near the village.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - C 55
description: Mixed parking lot with small picnic area. Faucet for refueling, waste water channel, emptying the toilet. Located on the main road, very noisy.

title: (08783) Masquefa - 3 Carrer la Pedrosa
description: Fairly flat and spacious open space, just in front of the mercadona, a car passes but to sleep very comfortable. Being in a polygon there is low cost gasoline in the bon area, which you can also wash your car.

title: (08635) Sant Esteve Sesrovires -
description: Fernando lets us use his land  (water, wifi, toilets/showers) + electricity. It can accommodate up to 15 people. Maximum length 6m. 2km from the service station, shops, etc. The airport is 30 minutes away. Condition: reservation required before coming by contacting him by WhatsApp or call (he speaks French well) or email. Remote place of civilization but super quiet. Barbecue also available and even wild boar visit in the evening :-)

title: (08231) Ca n'Amat - 2 Avinguda Antoni Gaudí
description: View of the mountains in the distance + nature all around you, super easy access

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 93 Carrer de Juliȧ Fuchs
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 93 Carrer de Juliȧ Fuchs
description: Bus parking for the Montserrat cog railway. Monistrol Vila station. To go there follow P1. Free day and night. Possibility of taking the train to go up to Montserrat. Superb.

title: (08294) El Bruc - Unnamed Road
description: Parking Can Jorba in Montserrat, near the restaurant Vinyanova, near the sector of climbing can jorba, without services not water, quiet at night and with good views of the mountain.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - BP-1121
description: Beautiful place overlooking the mountain in front of Monserrat. Quiet to stay.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 9 BP-1121
description: Small place facing the hands of Montserrat. We stayed the night without any problem (in April). Sound of the waterfall below. A few cars at night. Train line that no longer operates between 22:30 and 06:30

title: (08783) Masquefa - 15 Carrer Santa Clara
description: Plot in the center of town, on the plot there is a churreria to have a drink.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description: Industrial zone, quiet; no services

title: (08199) Marganell - BP-1121
description: Place next to the road that offers Monestir de Montserrat. There is an abandoned hotel 1.4 km from the monastery.

title: (08783) Masquefa - 11 Avinguda Catalunya
description: Laundry in the center of town

title: () Terrassa -
description: Site on the outskirts of Terrassa, quiet to spend the night, during the day some trucks, cars, cyclists and people can pass by

title: (08783) Masquefa - 28 Carrer Gironès
description: Large municipal parking lot, flat, quiet, in the center of town where you can easily access shops, parks, medical services, near gas stations ... it is next to some schools so during school time there may be some influx in the rush hours of entry and exit. A 3 min walk next to the ambulatory there is a large park that in summer is very good because there are water jets where you can cool off, very cool.

title: (08760) Martorell - Plaza Pompeu Fabra 5
description: Self-service laundry in Martorell Address: Plaza Pompeu Fabra 5, 08760, Martorell, Barcelona

title: (08760) Martorell - s/nº Carrer Montserrat
description: Newly paved, freshly paved and completely flat parking. Near the river to make bike routes, walk ...

title: (08760) Martorell - Carrer del Revall
description: Mixed paving of asphalt and gravel. Municipal swimming pool right next to paddle tennis courts. Pedestrian path next to the river for walks and bike rides and architectural monument "Pont del Diable" nearby.

title: (08760) Martorell - 13 Avinguda Mancomunitats Comarcals
description: Covered parking under a little-traveled road. Ideal for bad weather days in winter and for sunny days in summer. There are many services nearby (CAP, library, supermarkets, laundries, parks, fountains, etc.), further on there is a path where you can walk with animals.

title: (08224) Terrassa - 21 Carrer dels Rajolers
description: Public parking.

title: (08225) Terrassa - 7 Carrer de Torrent del Batlle
title_short: (08225) Terrassa - 7 Carrer de Torrent del Batlle
description: For a city with little parking. our best solution for 2 days. on the edge of a residential area near a football field small shop is nearby. quiet location for the city. 10min walk to downtown.

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Free parking with a great view, very quiet at night, ideal for visiting Montserrat early in the morning before the crowds arrive. Just below, the car parks of the Santa Cecilia monastery are quieter and accessible in the off season.

title: (08199) Marganell - BP-1121
description: Nice flat area on the side of a track just off the road. Amazing views of the rock formations. Hidden from sight, quiet with only church bells waking you up in the morning! Not suitable for large motorhome but 4x4 or van ideal (track not rough)

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Place with a great view right on the street which is quiet at night.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 2 Carrer Bruc de Baix
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 2 Carrer Bruc de Baix
description: Car park suitable for making a stop along the way with a view of the Montserrat mountain, it is very close to the highway and the noise of cars can be heard, but to rest for a while it is an open field of land with easy access

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Exceptional vantage point over the valley and the mountains. Montserrat in the background. A peaceful place to spend the night. You can hear the street, but only faintly. Beautiful sunset.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - 38 E-9
description: I calm down, the two bones you dress Montserrat. We haven't slept there, but I guess that's a no-brainer. Note: Dirt road with some stones!

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice parking space right on the edge of a road through the mountains. 4x4 makes it easier, but you can also do without. Great view of the mountains. Nice and clean so take your rubbish with you.
Not suitable for large mobile homes. rather VW buses or SUVs

title: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 3 Plaça Ind. Camp de la Serra
title_short: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 3 Plaça Ind. Camp de la Serra

title: (08294) El Bruc - 18 Carrer de l'1 d'Octubre
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 18 Carrer de l'1 d'Octubre
description: This is a new parking area on the edge of El Bruc with great access to the natural park. All but the biggest campers could fit and there’s a choice of sunny & shady parking spots. A water tap is just by the entrance and there’s bins over the road (near the other park4night). Please be respectful and don’t overstay your welcome.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 88 Carrer de Bruc del Mig
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 88 Carrer de Bruc del Mig
description: Free parking, great place

title: (08224) Terrassa - 52 N-150
description: Site away from the city with access by paved road, a few minutes from the center of Terrassa. Quiet place to rest. views of the city, but there is garbage on the ground

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Small parking at the edge of a low road at this season. Nice view on the valley and the massif of Montserrat. There are many other car parks along the road but this one has a water point just across the road to fill cans and bottles.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Place with unbeatable views of Montserrat. The downside is that to access this site you have to drive on a dirt road with a somewhat complicated section.

title: (08294) El Bruc - B-111
description: Parking, no service, but very quiet to sleep. In front of the monument Bruc.A at the foot of Montserrat.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - C-1411a
description: Pàrquing perfecte per fer L'excursió del Torrent dels Abadals and el turó del Marques

title: (08225) Terrassa - 20 Carrerada Pere Font I Marcet
title_short: (08225) Terrassa - 20 Carrerada Pere Font I Marcet
description: Its a quiet parking place, without any tolls.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Accessibility with 12to also no problem. There were no prohibition signs. Cleanliness should be mandatory. It goes without saying that no fire is made

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar -
description: A nice place easily accessible with some ground clearance. Of course, you shouldn't shy away from scratches in the paintwork in the wild either. Much lonelier than the other places below and a much nicer view.

title: (08298) Marganell - 100 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
title_short: (08298) Marganell - 100 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
description: Quiet place with spectacular views of the mountains. Directions in paved side street.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - BV-1122
description: Great place, very quiet and with views of Montserrat.

title: (08225) Terrassa - Unnamed Road
description:
Very peaceful spot to park around Barcelone, wide view on the mountains, wild goats and sheeps. There is a little lake and wheat fields around. Locals coming here to relax in the afternoon and run/bike. Quiet at night.
~2 flat spots. 
The road to come is not the best but we manage with a big van

title: (08225) Terrassa - 2 Carrer dels Jocs Olímpics
description:
New motorhome area set up by the town hall.
8 spaces for short vehicles up to 6m in epi.
For the long ones, you have to park in length and take two places.
No water tap, just drains.
The town hall will have to sanction badly parked vehicles since they occupy the site, because on weekdays in the afternoon there is a sports area.

title: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 21 Carrer Aureli Roviralta
title_short: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 21 Carrer Aureli Roviralta
description: It is in the town but it is a quiet area to sleep.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - 1 Camí del Burés
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - 1 Camí del Burés
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Perfect for about 5 campers

title_short: (08769) Castellví de Rosanes - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area, there are tables to go out to eat and stretch your legs. It has no services, it is quiet to sleep.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Magical place mentioned in the comments of the other nearby location. Access to the latter is via a somewhat stony track but which seems sufficiently smooth for Vans and small campers. The view over Montserrat is truly magical and gives you the impression of being alone in the world. Absolute calm and cleanliness. Please leave the place, leaving it as clean as you found it.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 3 Carrer Font del Cabrer
description: It is a very quiet Parking there are few vehicles it has electricity and in front of an area with houses, I have spent a very quiet night.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - 651 C-55

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 109 Carrer Major

title: (08223) Terrassa - 4-6 Carrer de Badalona

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103

title: (08790) Gelida - 4 Polígon Industrial la Gelidense
description: La Gelidense industrial estate, forest area ideal for summer, restaurant a few meters away, and train station 3 minutes away.

title: (08226) Terrassa - 272 Carretera de Matadepera
description: A safe daily parking by the police station in Terrassa. We decided to visit Barcelona through Terrassa. The S1 train station (50min to the center) is a 10 min walk away. No services

description: Point water in the spout on the right

description: Large parking 50 meters from the BP1103 road that leads to the Monastery of Montserrat. No service but exceptional view of the valley, the Pyrenees and the famous rocks. Had a very quiet night.

title: (08784) Piera - 2 Avinguda de la Carretera d'Igualada
title_short: (08784) Piera - 2 Avinguda de la Carretera d'Igualada
description: Flat ground parking in a very quiet area. 5 min from the town center. Supermarket and shops right in front No services

title: (08226) Terrassa - 189 Rambla de Francesc Macià
description: Big site. With many seats. It's okay.

title: (08230) Matadepera - 3D Diseminado la Mateta
description: Parking next to the Matadepera cemetery, there is a sign indicating that you can only circulate from 9-19, during the cemetery opening hours. We spent the night here, the local police came because the cemetery alarm went off but they didn't tell us anything about sleeping here. Some walkers and cyclists in the morning, but the night was super quiet. Without services.

title: (08784) Piera - 35 Carrer Edison
description: Very quiet and flat residential area to be able to park the van. The train station is on the parallel street. 5 minutes from the town center.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 2 Carrer del Bruc
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 2 Carrer del Bruc
description: Free paved parking next to the Guardia Civil barracks, with a children's park and fountain. Supermarket and services at 50m, train station with stop in Barcelona center at 100m.ZOna quiet with bike lane. Shading.

title: (08230) Matadepera - 3 Carrer de Bell Camp
description: Ground parking next to a street in a quiet residential area. Hiking trails begin. very quiet place in the forest and easy access.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Motorway area

title: (08227) Terrassa - 460 Avinguda del Vallès
description: Public parkin belonging to the town hall of Terrassa, in front of bingo, mercadona, carrefour, quiet and free, does not close at night and very wide

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 6 Passeig Muntanya
description: Parking near les font station with shade. Gravel floor, practically level. There are 2 parking areas. Be careful if the gps leads you through a 2.7 tunnel there is another access above the roads if you come from Rubí.

title: (08294) El Bruc - BP-1103
description: Ravine with spectacular views towards the horizon. In front there is a beautiful little hill and if you look back you can see part of the Montserrat Mountain. The Pyrenees are also perfectly visible on the horizon. Brutal landscape!

title: (08740) Barcelona -
description: Free parking day and night. Perfect for going on the metro into the city. There are no time restrictions. We slept for one night and left our van for a whole day to visit Barcelona. The area is safe and clean. There is parallel parking as well as parking bays. We were able to parallel park on the road. There is noise around 7am due to the rush hour but any other time is pretty quiet.

title: (08294) El Bruc - BP-1101
description: Parking can Massana, where they start many routes to Montserrat. Picnic area. Fantastic view.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 10 Carrer Navarra
description: Washing machine for your clothes close to a supermarket and a couple restaurants

title: (08296) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Unnamed Road
description: A place surrounded by nature, beautiful view to the mountains (Montserrat). We just made a stop there and didn't spend the night but it seems possible to stay overnight. You can just reach it with 4x4.

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
title_short: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
description: Level public car park, next to Les Font station. Quiet at night.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 12 Carrer Navarra
description: Vienna terrassa est parking

title: (08298) Marganell - 109 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
title_short: (08298) Marganell - 109 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
description: Small picnic area with a table. Ideal for a stop along the way. Views of Monserrat. There is a bigger parking lot right in front that belongs to the restaurant.

title: (08790) Gelida - 15 Camí Vell de l'Estació
description: Small concrete parking in the middle of the village, below the church (rings every hour). No service, but free ... Steep access, but feasible. 50m coffee. Small vehicles only.

title: (08230) Matadepera - BV-1221
description: Parking next to the road, you can not stay overnight. There is no service.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 1630 A-2
description: Gas station with toilet and shower and a restaurant, we did not sleep but I think there is possibility to spend the night

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Granada
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Granada
description: SHOWERS! For those who love lobre camping, here is a truck stop where you can take a shower! Simple but clean bathrooms with hot water. The location location is called CTW Parking Services, insert it into Google Maps for more accurate directions. Probably best if you have cash, not sure if they take the card. The showers are located in the area where all the trucks are parked, near the gas station. Bring your towel and toiletries.

title: (08790) Gelida - 23 Avinguda Europa
description: Ground parking next to the soccer field and a park. Quiet zone.

title: (08790) Gelida - 33 Camí Castell
description: Place for parking and overnight

title: (08791) Sant Llorenç d'Hortons - Unnamed Road
description: Linda paysage de vinas, you can see the train that passes to Barcelona. we spent a quiet night we did not see anyone, but a bit of garbage can be seen coming to make the party. spacious and easy access

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 6 Carrer Garraf
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 6 Carrer Garraf
description: Huge parking lot of hard ground. To spend the night, ideal. Zero problems, zero noise.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 37 Avinguda Constitució
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 37 Avinguda Constitució
description: Asphalted and level esplanade where you can spend the night during the whole week except on Fridays, parking is prohibited from 5:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

title: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Passatge dels Catalans
title_short: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Passatge dels Catalans
description: New area in the city center, near the sports pavilion and the municipal swimming pool. Location very well connected by train and bus to visit Montserrat, Manresa and surroundings.  Dog are allowed on the caravan area but they should stay off playground. its also a nice dog park to use 2 meter away. you have dog bags for feces on the place, so please keep the dog park clean.

title: (08790) Gelida - 31 Camí Castell
description: Parking next to the castle of Gelida, perfect place to sleep quietly the access road is not paved but is in good condition. There is a very tight curve so large volume vans and motorhomes are better experienced. there are no services. in the zone. hiking, biking and climbing. the town of Gelida very beautiful.

title: (08227) -
description: It is located at Avinguda del Mas Sot 40, electricity, emptying and filling, emptying sewage, 7 places for motorhomes.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 6 Torre Mossen Homs
description: Drinking water point to recharge.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Vallès
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Vallès
description: Newly opened laundry. Large esplanade nearby to park without problems.

title: (08230) Matadepera - 5 Carrer dels Lledoners
description: Land parking of the municipal golf club. there are no services but it gets you out of a hurry. very close to the center of the town of Matadepera. We were one night and very quiet.

title: (08191) Rubí - 38 Avinguda Castellbisbal
description: Quiet parking. Transport 10min walk to the center of Barcelona. No service but supermarket opposite open until 22h

title: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - 16 Carrer Gran
title_short: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - 16 Carrer Gran
description: Cheap prices and good service.

title: (08227) - 18 Carrer Mossen Batlle
description: Free barrier-free parking

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer del Gimnàs
description: Municipal parking

title: (08790) Gelida - Passeig Cantillepa
description: Parking in the countryside, next to a picnic area and a barbecue area with bar (3min). It has a source but it doesn't always work. Quiet place, far from civilization but near the town. the access road is quite high but is lit (although the beginning is sand). Highly recommended!

title: (08228) Terrassa - 17 C-58
description: It is a gas station where you can load water. The price is 1 euro for 5 minutes but a good stream comes out and we have filled the 90 L tank for 1 euro.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 4 Diseminado Torre Mossen Homs
description: Ground parking with views of La Mola. Next to a recreational zone with tap water and picknick tables. Directly underneath high voltage electricity lines that buzz.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 4 Diseminado Torre Mossen Homs
description: Parking and picnic area (with tables and seats) at the Can Bonvilar information center. A place in Terrassa where you can walk and cycle with the family (easy level) in its surroundings.

title: (08278) Mura - 12 BV-1221
description: Site to spend the night! near a chasm

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 51 Passeig Rafael de Casanova
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 51 Passeig Rafael de Casanova
description: gravel parking lot

title: (08719) Castellolí - N-IIz
description: Views to Montserrat

title: (08297) Castellgalí -
description: New motorhome area, free, with water and emptying, near municipal swimming pool, gym, camping area and municipal hostel. Possibility of walks and shops in the town and nearby restaurants 5 min walking.

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer d'Hipatia
description: Public parking approximately 15 minutes from the center of Rubí and the train station in front of the Can Oriol park.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - Buzón 230
description: Parking and sports area of the city, well lit, very quiet. 10 minutes from the center of the village. Zone and small football field.

title: (08297) - 2A Carrer Maria Aurèlia Capmany
description: To make a stop along the way. there is a picnic area and a lot of paved parking. It's not flat

title: (08191) Rubí - 231 Carretera Molins de Rei
description: Paid truck parking space with security day and night and barrier. On request, we were allowed to stay there overnight with our van (Fiat Ducato) for a fee  and use the very clean and modern sanitary facilities (shower and toilet). A nice little bar/bistro with very good breakfast and food is also on the premises. It's a bit noisy in the morning because the parking lot is right next to a road. A safe option for a visit to Barcelona, as there is a high level of security throughout the site.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - 2 Carrer Via Augusta
description: Small peaceful green area by the river. No convenience, easy access, fishing. A very calm night. Railroad nearby but not disturbing at all.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - 2 Carrer Via Augusta
description: Small path along the water. It has a railway line on the other side of the river but not disturbing. It is a dead end so it's quiet ... reserved for vans because narrow dirt road.

title: (08174) Barcelona - Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Public parking with long spaces, in a quiet and sunny area. very close to the center.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful escape underneath the trees near the top of the hill. Cut out next to the lane is reasonably flat. You could comfortably fit a few 4x4 vehicles here. Wonderful views!!

title: (08207) Sabadell - 98 Diseminado Masia Can Deu
description: Area outside Sabadell (Barcelona) where you can enjoy free parking, as well as tables and barbecue for rent. 5 minutes from Sabadell center and 30 minutes from BCN. No service. There is a mosque. It's right at the entrance of the forest where you can ejoy a walk. Perfect for sleeping and ideal for a stop.

title: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 22 Carrer de Sabina Canyameras
title_short: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 22 Carrer de Sabina Canyameras
description: Simple parking for approximately 100 cars (almost empty on Sunday/Monday night).  It is on edge of city. Also good for long vehicles (7.5m).

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - Av. Can Pallàs
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - Av. Can Pallàs
description: Quiet place to sleep. There is always some AC, a safe place, surrounded by houses and buildings, plus a pizzeria right next door...

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Repsol station with LPG

title: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 4 Carrer de Gabriel Ferrater
title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 4 Carrer de Gabriel Ferrater
description: Quiet area where to spend the night. You can take a walk with your dog on a path. There are picnic tables. On Fridays and Saturdays, boys from the town go there with motorcycles

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Parking x car near the mall, quiet day and night .... we had no problem.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Can Coll
description: Dirt parking next to the access to the Font de les Rovires and the waterfalls. One of the best and most isolated rural areas near Pallejà. It is reached by the road that goes up to the institute, then turns into a dirt road that narrows in some places. There are areas where there is only room for one vehicle and areas with a slope. Be careful as there are parts of the road that are not easy with large vehicles, but it is worth going. At Font de les Rovires there is a natural water spring, waterfalls and a picnic table in a beautiful natural setting.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Parking at the entrance to the font de les rovires from the bottom. In the middle of the forest. there are some almost flat spaces to park and with shade. It is at the end of a dead end road. if there are more vehicles it can be difficult to maneuver to turn around, so it is advisable to park facing the exit of the road. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. In the last section there is a slope and a curve to the left. Then it is to follow the path one more minute to the end. area frequented by hikers.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful open space amongst the trees. Great tracks throughout the mountain for those wanting to explore, and loads of other little spots to place yourself. We found this to be the best as we could get solar most of the day despite being surrounded by trees.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurni d´Anoia - Carrer de les Flors
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurni d´Anoia - Carrer de les Flors
description: Large camper or with comfortable trailer. New area Many thanks to the municipality of Sant Sadurní d'Anoia for this initiative. Please, fellow travelers, take care of the site so that you can enjoy it for a long time.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Grassy esplanade in the middle of the forest away from the main road. There are plenty of flat, shaded parking spaces. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08278) Mura - 15 BV-1221
description: Parking in the Sant Llorenç del Munt Natural Park, between weeks because few people go there and it's super quiet, lots of people on weekends, toilets during the day next to the park

title: (08207) Sabadell - 177 Carretera Matadepera
description: Parking on the outskirts of Sabadell, near the church of San Julia, very quiet site of land and little shade.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carrer de les Flors
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carrer de les Flors
description: Parking in front of an abandoned old castle. Flat concrete ground and close to the town. No signs that parking or anything is forbidden. No services available

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Wide esplanade in the middle of the forest. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. There are enough places to park although they are not completely flat. Sunny place much of the day. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08780) Pallejà - 597 N-2
description: Ample asphalt parking at the Repsol gas station next to the N-II. There is a restaurant that is open until noon. Between the gas station and the restaurant there is a fountain where you can fill up with clean water. It is a tap without a thread, so you have to use a pressure adapter.

title: (08754) El Papiol - C-1413a
description: Parking at the El Papiol train station. station bar open from Monday to Friday from 6 in the morning to 10 at night, 20 minutes by train to the very center of Barcelona, with trains every 15 minutes, excursions to the escletxes del papiol and many hiking trails on foot from Collserola (lung of Barcelona). Supermarkets in town, charter, condis, and many bars. Very friendly and homely people. A small town anchored in time, twenty minutes from the center of Barcelona.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Roca d’Adroc
description: Large dirt car park without services next to the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visit the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. It does not have services but it does have garbage containers. It is an ideal place to stop. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08754) El Papiol - 3 Cami Can Esteve
description: 20 minutes by train to the very center of Barcelona, with trains every 15 minutes, excursions to the escletxes del papiol and many hiking trails at the foot of the collserola (lung of barcelona). Supermarkets in town, charter, condis, and many bars. Very friendly and homely people. A small town anchored in time, twenty minutes from the center of Barcelona.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
description: Parking for motorhomes not guarded very close to the Sant Cugat - Rubí exit of the AP7 motorway. Area to spend the night without any kind of service. Very close to the shopping center. 32 seats in battery plus 15 in line.

title: (08785) Vallbona d'Anoia - 1 Carrer Major
description: rest area without services

title: (08205) Sabadell - 50 Carrer Regne Unit
description: Park area of ​​Can Gambus. Asphalted parking near the highway. With water from sources and quiet area. Lawn and tranquility. Without height limits. It is not a bad area to spend the night.

title: (08197) Valldoreix - 76B Avinguda de Can Monmany
description: Parking next to the road. In front there is a mountain area with mountain routes.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Carrer del Llaurador
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Carrer del Llaurador
description: Dirt parking in front of a brasserie restaurant where cars are parked to walk and play with the dogs, next to the stream, picnic area, skate park.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Large dirt and grass car park without services next to the forest between the institute and the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. There are higher places for those who dare or have a 4x4. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visiting Pallejà or the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Stone car park next to the road between Pallejà and the Fontpineda urbanisation. It is completely flat, sunny, and surrounded by nature. There are trails in the surrounding area to walk up the mountain. Crossing to the other side of the road there is a path that leads to the Pallejà antenna, where you can enjoy the panoramic views of the region and Barcelona.

title: (08207) Sabadell - 297 Avinguda de Matadepera
description: Gas station with laundry

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Ronda d'Arraona
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Ronda d'Arraona
description: Land parking used by neighbors, but ACs are also parked there. It is centrally located and is very close to a park for walking and a Repsol gas station. It is also close to different shops.

title: (08739) - Camí del Castell
description: In the car park of Castell Subirats Castle. Good for picnic but too sloping.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
description: Parking near the cemetery, quiet ideal for a stop; supermarket at 1 km; shady; near center and assembly hall.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 71 Ronda de Santa Julita
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 71 Ronda de Santa Julita
description: Ground parking. Next to a sports complex and a gas station and about 600 meters from the town center. Ahead is the local police. Easy to park for a 7.5m motorhome.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 64P Carrer de Perpinyà
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 64P Carrer de Perpinyà
description: Streets where you can sleep peacefully in an urbanization, near a Mercadona and bars and restaurants. Ideal place to spend the night and the next day to do a route or visit a winery always with Education and respect for the neighbors who live there.

title: (08174) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Camí de Can Camps
title_short: (08174) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Camí de Can Camps
description: It's a dead-end street that passes by a couple of office buildings. It's fully parked during the day on working days, but totally empty at night and on weekends. The only problem might be teenagers parking their cars at the very end of the street and hiking a bit up to the mountain to drink alcohol and play music there on Friday or Saturday night.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carretera de Sant Quintí
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carretera de Sant Quintí
description: Gas station, laundry. Sito with space, where you can refuel and also laundry service.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 42 Rambla de la Generalitat
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 42 Rambla de la Generalitat
description: Self-service laundry

title: (08756) La Palma de Cervelló - 25 Carrer Sant Jordi
title_short: (08756) La Palma de Cervelló - 25 Carrer Sant Jordi
description: Dirt parking behind the gas station. It is at a lower level of the road so it can be quite quiet.

title: (08206) Sabadell - 32 Avinguda d'Estrasburg
description: Wash Up Laundry

title: (08757) Can Rigol - Unnamed road
description: Sant Ponç Monastery, Sunday in May, there is no one, perfect for eating, siesta, walking. Due to the heat it is very good to be in the shade and spend air. We will not stay to sleep but for the tranquility and the wide clean space of land another day will be.
